greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to write n as a sum of two coprime semiprimes.
comment: Is a(n)>0 for n>210? see conjecture in A072931.
The graph of this sequence is compelling evidence that 210 is the last term of sequence A088185. - _T. D. Noe_, Apr 10 2007
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Relatively Prime
program: (PARI) a(n)=sum(i=1, n, sum(j=1, i, if (gcd(i,j)==1, if (abs(bigomega(i)-2) +abs(bigomega(j)-2) +abs(n-i-j),0,1)))) \\ after A072966; _Michel Marcus_, Sep 08 2015
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 22 2003
